A Nightmare on Elm Street is a 1984 American supernatural slasher film written 
and directed by Wes Craven, and the first film of the Nightmare on Elm Street 
franchise. The film stars Heather Langenkamp, John Saxon, Ronee Blakley, 
Amanda Wyss, Jsu Garcia, Robert Englund, and Johnny Depp in his feature film 
debut. ... Glen falls asleep at their appointed hour, and Freddy kills him.
